column4: nobody knows it but he had a bedder soundchip than the comodore...
and know i killed my xp on my laptop and i need some help to get him run ^
my amiga got a ppc card, 64mb fast ram
but ubuntu dosnt like my intel chipset
actual i let run a "vesa" mode at 1280x800
what version of ubuntu are you trying?
does their website have any linux support on it?
I guess you would Disable acpi at boot by adding  'acpi=on apm=off'  to the kernel line in grub config.
